artist: Artist: Jean-Pierre Norblin de la Gourdaine
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure wrapped in blankets, wearing a thorny crown stands with a man in noble clothing and guards on stone steps; man in noble clothing to his R addresses an energetic crowd; some in the crowd point toward the group on the steps, while some push others; three people at far R climbing a large stone bust
medium: Etching and drypoint on woven Japan
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Ecce Homo
